about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Excellence in Nail Artistry Since 2009
about.heroDescription: Where passion for nail artistry meets exceptional service in the heart of Z√ºrich
about.valuesPrinciple: These core principles guide every service we provide and every interaction we have
about.storyText: Fabulous Nails & Spa was born from a passion for nail artistry and a vision to create a sanctuary where beauty meets relaxation. Since opening our doors in 2009 in the heart of Z√ºrich, we have been dedicated to providing exceptional nail care services in an elegant and welcoming environment. Our journey began with a simple mission: to elevate the nail salon experience by combining artistic excellence, premium products, and personalized care. Today, we are proud to be one of Z√ºrich's most trusted nail destinations, serving thousands of satisfied clients who return time and again for our signature blend of artistry, professionalism, and warm hospitality.
about.missionText: Our mission is to deliver exceptional nail care experiences that go beyond expectations. We believe that every visit should be a moment of indulgence, creativity, and personal expression. By using only the finest products, maintaining the highest hygiene standards, and continuously training in the latest techniques, we ensure that each client leaves not just with beautiful nails, but with renewed confidence and a smile. We are committed to creating a welcoming space where everyone feels valued, pampered, and inspired to express their unique style.
about.value1Text: We pursue perfection in every detail, from technique to customer service, ensuring exceptional results every time.
about.value2Text: Your health is our priority. We follow strict sanitation protocols and use sterilized tools for every service.
about.value3Text: We celebrate artistic expression and stay ahead of nail art trends to bring you the latest and most stunning designs.
about.value4Text: Your satisfaction drives everything we do. We listen, understand, and tailor our services to your unique needs.
about.teamText: Our talented team of certified nail technicians brings years of experience and a passion for nail artistry. Each member is dedicated to continuous learning and mastering the latest techniques to provide you with cutting-edge nail services. We take pride in our friendly, professional approach and our ability to turn your nail dreams into reality.
about.locationHours: Monday-Friday: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM, Saturday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Sunday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM
